mapper.select: select sku, dySku, total_num, on_way_num, uncheck_num, pending_pickup_num, pending_deliver_num, defect_num, statistical_time, owner from l_product_statistic
select sku, dySku, total_num, on_way_num, uncheck_num, pending_pickup_num, pending_deliver_num, defect_num, statistical_time, owner from l_product_statistic where owner = #{username}
select sku, dySku, total_num, on_way_num, uncheck_num, pending_pickup_num, pending_deliver_num, defect_num, statistical_time, owner from l_product_statistic where sku = #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into l_product_statistic (sku, dySku, total_num, on_way_num, uncheck_num, pending_pickup_num, pending_deliver_num, defect_num, statistical_time, owner) values (#{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dysku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{onWayNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uncheckNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pendingPickupNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pendingDeliverNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defectNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statisticalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into l_product_statistic (sku, dySku, total_num, on_way_num, uncheck_num, pending_pickup_num, pending_deliver_num, defect_num, statistical_time, owner) values
(#{item.sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dysku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.totalNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.onWayNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.uncheckNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pendingPickupNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pendingDeliverNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.defectNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.statisticalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into l_product_statistic
sku,
dySku,
total_num,
on_way_num,
uncheck_num,
pending_pickup_num,
pending_deliver_num,
defect_num,
statistical_time,
owner,
#{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dysku,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{totalNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{onWayNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{uncheckNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pendingPickupNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pendingDeliverNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{defectNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{statisticalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update l_product_statistic
dySku = #{dysku,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
total_num = #{totalNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
on_way_num = #{onWayNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
uncheck_num = #{uncheckNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pending_pickup_num = #{pendingPickupNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pending_deliver_num = #{pendingDeliverNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
defect_num = #{defectNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
statistical_time = #{statisticalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where sku = #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update l_product_statistic set dySku = #{dysku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_num = #{totalNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, on_way_num = #{onWayNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uncheck_num = #{uncheckNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pending_pickup_num = #{pendingPickupNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pending_deliver_num = #{pendingDeliverNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, defect_num = #{defectNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, owner = #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, statistical_time = #{statisticalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where sku = #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
